title: Greek farro salad
ingredients: ['200g farro', '750ml water', '2 tomatoes, chopped', '1/2 cucumber, chopped', '1/2 small onion, chopped', '1 small green pepper, chopped', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh mint', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', 'salt and pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '100g feta cheese, crumbled']
